INSERT INTO Production.ZeroInventory (DeletedProductID, RemovedOnDate) SELECT ProductID, GETDATE() FROM (MERGE Production.ProductInventory AS pi USING (SELECT ProductID, SUM(OrderQty) FROM Sales.SalesOrderDetail AS sod JOIN Sales.SalesOrderHeader AS soh ON sod.SalesOrderID = soh.SalesOrderID AND soh.OrderDate = '20070401' GROUP BY ProductID) AS src (ProductID, OrderQty) ON (pi.ProductID = src.ProductID) WHEN MATCHED AND pi.Quantity - src.OrderQty <= 0 THEN DELETE WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET pi.Quantity = pi.Quantity - src.OrderQty OUTPUT $action, deleted.ProductID) AS Changes (Action, ProductID) WHERE Action = 'DELETE'

INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE sales select * FROM raw_sales;
INSERT INTO TABLE sales select * FROM raw_sales;
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE sales PARTITION (region='Asia') select id, amount FROM raw_sales WHERE region='Asia';
INSERT INTO TABLE sales PARTITION (region='Europe') select id, amount FROM raw_sales WHERE region='Europe';
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE sales PARTITION (region='Africa') IF NOT EXISTS SELECT id, amount FROM raw_sales WHERE region='Africa';
FROM raw_data INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE tal0 SELECT *;

FROM customer_info INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE customer_backup SELECT id, name, phone WHERE is_valid=1 INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE vip_customer SELECT id, name, email WHERE member_level='VIP' INSERT INTO TABLE new_customer SELECT id, register_time WHERE register_time > '2024-06-01';
FROM user_activities INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE user_stats PARTITION (country='CN', province='Beijing') SELECT user_id, login_count;
FROM product_logs INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE product_archive PARTITION (category='books') IF NOT EXISTS SELECT product_id, stock_num;

FROM customer_orders INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE order_summary PARTITION (region='North') IF NOT EXISTS SELECT order_id WHERE region='North' INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE order_archive PARTITION (status='completed') SELECT shipping_address WHERE order_status='completed';

FROM sales INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE sales_partition PARTITION (region='West', quarter='Q3') IF NOT EXISTS SELECT transaction_id, amount_date INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE sales_archive PARTITION (status='refunded') SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, reason WHERE is_refunded=1 INSERT INTO TABLE sales_analytics PARTITION (analysis_type='daily') SELECT transaction_date, amount;
FROM raw_data INSERT INTO TABLE customer SELECT id, name, email;

FROM user_data INSERT INTO TABLE active_users SELECT id, name, email WHERE status='active' INSERT INTO TABLE new_users SELECT id, register_date WHERE register_date > '2024-01-01' INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE all_users SELECT id, name, status;
FROM user_logs INSERT INTO TABLE visit_stats PARTITION (dt='2024-08-15') SELECT user_id WHERE visit_date='2024-08-15';

FROM customer_orders INSERT INTO TABLE orders PARTITION (dt='2025-08-15') SELECT order_id WHERE visit_date='2025-08-15' INSERT INTO TABLE order_2023 PARTITION (dt='2023-08-15') SELECT order_id WHERE visit_date='2023-08-15';

FROM sales INSERT INTO TABLE monthly_sales PARTITION (month='202408') SELECT product_id, sales_count INSERT INTO TABLE top_products PARTITION (category='electronics') SELECT product_id, total_sales INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE sales_archive PARTITION (quarter='2024Q3') IF NOT EXISTS SELECT product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2024-07-01' AND '2024-09-30';
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE sales PARTITION (region, year) select id FROM raw_sales;
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE user_logs PARTITION (country='CN', province) select user_id FROM all_logs where country='CN';
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE order_stats PARTITION (month='August', status='active') select order_id FROM order_details where amount > 100;
INSERT INTO TABLE sales PARTITION (region, year) select id FROM raw_sales;
INSERT INTO TABLE user_logs PARTITION (country='CN', province) select user_id FROM all_logs where country='CN';
INSERT INTO TABLE order_stats PARTITION (month='August', status='active') select order_id FROM order_details where amount > 100;
INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/hive/output' SELECT id, name FROM employee;
INSERT OVERWRITE LOCAL DIRECTORY '/tmp/local_output' SELECT order_id FROM sales;
INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/data/export' ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' SELECT product_id, category FROM products;
INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/archive/logs' STORED AS PARQUET SELECT log_date, message FROM system_logs;
INSERT OVERWRITE LOCAL DIRECTORY '/tmp/report' ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' STORED AS TEXTFILE SELECT login_time FROM user_activity;
FROM employee INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/output/emp_data' SELECT id;
FROM employee INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/output/emp_data' SELECT id INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/output/emp_data' SELECT name;
FROM employee INSERT OVERWRITE LOCAL DIRECTORY '/user/output/emp_data' SELECT id INSERT OVERWRITE LOCAL DIRECTORY '/user/output/emp_data' SELECT name;

FROM employee INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/output/emp_data' SELECT id INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/output/emp_data' SELECT name INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/output/emp_data' SELECT user;
